spiritsExplanation:
The workout video titled '45 Min Tabata HIIT Workouts for Weight Loss & Strength - Full Body Workout at Home with Weights' indicates a "High-Energy & Intense" spirit. The keyword 'HIIT' (High-Intensity Interval Training) along with 'Tabata' and 'weight loss & strength' suggests a fast-paced, high-intensity workout aimed at pushing limits, supporting the high score of 0.9 for this spirit. The description and tags emphasize high-intensity and full-body engagement, reinforcing this classification.

Additionally, the workout shows elements of "Structured & Disciplined," scoring 0.65. Tabata is a structured protocol with specific intervals and rest periods, indicating a methodical approach. This structured nature, evident in both title and tags, supports this secondary spirit. 

Other spirits like "Flow & Rhythm" and "Soothing & Restorative" were excluded due to the lack of emphasis on continuous smooth movement or recovery focus, evident from both the content and user feedback highlighting intensity and challenge rather than relaxation.
